DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether propolis is effective in the treatment and prevention of radiotherapy induced oral mucositis.
DOC.brief_title: Assessing the Preventing and Therapeutic Effect of Propolis in Radiotherapy Induced Mucositis of Head and Neck Cancers
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with head and neck malignancy with inclusion criteria randomly divide in 2 groups and take the intervention.
DOC.criteria: age >15 need of radiotherapy at least half of the mouth in the field of radiation dose 50 70 Gy head & neck malignancy systemic disease FBS > 150 WBC > 3000 history of radiotherapy need of chemotherapy systemic disease
